text: Waipathe, United States National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency is a village in Ye Township in Mawlamyine District in the Mon State of south-east Myanmar. Waipathe is on a tributary of the Palantha Chaung, in the foothills of the Tenasserim Range, about west of Dabataw.Burma 1:250,000 topographic map, Series U542, ND 47-02 Ye U.S. Army Map Service, December 1959 ==Notes== ==External links== * "Waipathe Map — Satellite Images of Waipathe" Maplandia World Gazetteer Category:Populated places in Mon State
title: Waipathe
